channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.description:

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0

  • Description: Package discovered after the sort having been unloaded damaged. Dents in bottle resulted in internal leakage through vented cap. No internal packaging to secure contents during shipment.

item.title: Report X-2024050012
item.description:
Report X-2024050012

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-03T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-24
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO CENTER, CLERK WRAPPED IN TWO PLASTIC BAGS. CLERK INFORMED RMP THAT SHE HAD RECEIVED A LEAKING PACKAGE. RMP OBSERVED THAT PACKAGE WAS A HAZMAT AND CONTACTED DESIGNATED RESPONDER TO COLLECT AND PROCESS THE PACKAGE PER THE DMP PROCEDURE.
